title: Shattered
description: Beth and Shane's story continues in this new installment of the McIntyre Security Bodyguard series. After the death of Beth's childhood abductor, Howard Kline, Beth and Shane are free to begin their life together. â€‹ Beth's future is looking bright. Luciana will stop at nothing to destroy's Shane's future, including risking the life of the one person he can't live without.
